page.title: 13 Fashions and Trends
page.content: In{1985}people care how they look. The most{common clothes}for girls are all different types of{tight jeans}and 3/4 length{trousers}which go down to mid-calf.{Ankle socks}are common as well.Studded{belts,}ankle{chains}and dangling{earrings}are quite popular. Pointed{shoes,}pixi{boots}and stiletto {heels}are worn often. The{toys}people play with nowadays are changing all the time.{'Walkmans' are common things, they are pocket sized tape players with ear phones.You can carry them round with you. Some of the most common games use {computers}and{colour T.V. B.M.X bikes are not quite as popular as they were about 1\ years ago. Nearly all the boys want a{motorbike}when they are 16 Popular also, are{battery powered {games}that involve a tiny screen and targets to hit.
